about_the_game:
Gameplay

In The Last Pussy: Survival Lesson, you will play as the main character who is locked up in an underground bunker with hot and beautiful girls. Survive in limited environments, complete story quests, interact with other survivors, and of course, experience the intense and passionate atmosphere between the characters.

Storyline

Tyler woke up in the bunker with three strange girls. Unfortunately, their memories have been partially erased, so no one remembers how they got to this mysterious place. They begin to establish a life in their new reality in an attempt to answer many questions. What really happened to them? Are they related to each other? What awaits them outside? Only you can solve all the secrets and get out.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains images of sex and strong language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz

  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM

short_description: The Last Pussy: Survival Lesson is an adult visual novel with point & click elements in a post-apocalyptic bunker setting.
